price: 65. Toysa koros dawaanikit korta waqdi xuumiyyak (sutiyyak) meesiteenik, Yalla kallacan dooqá kaah caglisak, tokkel Yalli badak ken naggossu heeh barri fan ken bukku haa waqdi, usun too waqdi agleyta kaat haanaah, sinni koroosannuh gacan.
arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā rakibū fī al-ful'ki daʿawū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna falammā najjāhum ilā al-bari idhā hum yush'rikūna
